definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: A defense lawyer says Jufer was intoxicated at the time of his crime.
sentences.chinese: 律师以他那富有感染力的辩护说服了陪审团。

sentences.english: Negative feelings and moods are contagious as well.
sentences.chinese: 负面情绪和心情也是有感染力的。

sentences.english: His manual signs outtell his words.
sentences.chinese: 他的手势比他的语言更具感染力。

sentences.english: She kept on laughing, didn`t stop, and it was contagious.
sentences.chinese: 她不住地笑，没有停下来，笑声很有感染力。
很明显，演说缺少感染力。

sentences.english: Have the art atmosphere of the mightiness.
sentences.chinese: 具有强烈的艺术感染力。

sentences.english: And the boy often broke into an infectious laugh.
sentences.chinese: 于是男孩就会爆发出有感染力的大笑。

sentences.english: Brazilian teams play with a contagious exuberance.
sentences.chinese: 巴西队踢起球来带有感染力很强的激情。

sentences.english: My brother - in - law's laugh , which was very infections , broke the silence.
sentences.chinese: 我姐夫那富有感染力的笑声打破了沉默。

sentences.english: Each one is illustrated with pieces that combine pageantry with emotional appeal.
sentences.chinese: 它们各自都由集华丽与感染力与一身的图片进行展示。

sentences.english: Wallinger's works have a broad appeal.
sentences.chinese: 渥林格的作品具有广泛的感染力。

sentences.english: Below you can see some of his impressive work.
sentences.chinese: 以下你能看到他一些极富感染力的作品。

sentences.english: Haiyan's unique tragic emotion made his novels full of great impact.
sentences.chinese: 海岩独特的悲剧情结使他的小说充满震撼力和感染力。

sentences.english: The British belief in the "bastion of Empire" was infectious.
sentences.chinese: 英国人对于“帝国的铜墙铁壁”的信仰是有感染力的。

sentences.english: She was sweetened with her charming smile.
sentences.chinese: 她那富有感染力的微笑令她显得十分可爱。

sentences.english: This is compensated for by an outer impressiveness.
sentences.chinese: 这种空虚被具有感染力的外表所掩盖。

definition: (personal) warmth/approachability/accessibility/(in a product) user friendliness/(chemistry) affinity
training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
(of a singer etc) excellent in voice and expression (idiom)
